lead_paragraph: BOKOR--Bruce, died unexpectedly on May 28th in Northampton, MA. A graduate of Dartmouth College, Bruce was a scholar, a gifted athlete and a great humanitarian. Bruce travelled a dark and difficult path for much of his life. After many troubled years, he became an educator, devoted to the children he taught. Cherished by his parents. Gail and Gene, he is also survived by his sister, Jill and her husband, Sanford Smith, his brother Peter and his wife Jeannie Blaustein, a nephew, Luc Bokor-Smith and two nieces Sophie and Livia Bokor. Interment will be private. Information about tribute gifts to a charity in Bruce's name will be forthcoming. The family would like to thank all the wonderful people who helped and cared for Bruce.
